verses.text: Then \w Shephatiah|strong="H8203"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mattan|strong="H4977"\w*, and \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pashur|strong="H6583"\w*, and \w Jucal|strong="H3116"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w*, and \w Pashur|strong="H6583"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Malchiah|strong="H4441"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, He that \w remaineth|strong="H3427"\w* in this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and by the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*: but he that goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; for he shall have his \w life|strong="H5315"\w* for a \w prey|strong="H7998"\w*, and shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, This \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H5414"\w* be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon’s|strong="H0894"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, which shall \w take|strong="H3920"\w* it.

Therefore the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, We beseech thee, let this \w man|strong="H0376"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: for \w thus|strong="H3651"\w* he \w weakeneth|strong="H7503"\w* the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* that \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* in this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, in \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* such \w words|strong="H1697"\w* unto them: for this \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w seeketh|strong="H1875"\w* not the \w welfare|strong="H7965"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, but the \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*.\f + \fr 38.4 \ft welfare: Heb. peace\f*

Then \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, he \add is\add* in your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: for the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \add is\add* not \add he that\add* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* do \add any\add* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* against you.

Then \w took|strong="H3947"\w* they \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* him into the \w dungeon|strong="H0953"\w* of \w Malchiah|strong="H4441"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hammelech|strong="H4428"\w*, that \add was\add* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w*: and they let \w down|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* with \w cords|strong="H2256"\w*. And in the \w dungeon|strong="H0953"\w* \add there was\add* no \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, but \w mire|strong="H2916"\w*: so \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w sunk|strong="H2883"\w* in the \w mire|strong="H2916"\w*.\f + \fr 38.6 \ft of Hammelech: or, of the king\f*

¶ Now when \w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* the \w Ethiopian|strong="H3569"\w*, \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* which was in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that they had \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* in the \w dungeon|strong="H0953"\w*; the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* then \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*;

\w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

My \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, these \w men|strong="H0582"\w* have done \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* in all that they have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, whom they have \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* into the \w dungeon|strong="H0953"\w*; and he is like to \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w hunger|strong="H7458"\w* in the \w place|strong="H8478"\w* where he is: for \add there is\add* no more \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 38.9 \ft he is like…: Heb. he will die\f*

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* the \w Ethiopian|strong="H3569"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* from hence \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* with \w thee|strong="H3027"\w*, and take \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* out of the \w dungeon|strong="H0953"\w*, before he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 38.10 \ft with thee: Heb. in thine hand\f*

So \w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* with \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* under the \w treasury|strong="H0214"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* thence \w old|strong="H1094"\w* cast \w clouts|strong="H5499"\w* and \w old|strong="H1094"\w* rotten \w rags|strong="H4418"\w*, and let them \w down|strong="H7971"\w* by \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* into the \w dungeon|strong="H0953"\w* to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*.

And \w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* the \w Ethiopian|strong="H3569"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w Put|strong="H7760"\w* now \add these\add* \w old|strong="H1094"\w* cast \w clouts|strong="H5499"\w* and rotten \w rags|strong="H4418"\w* under thine \w armholes|strong="H0679"\w* under the \w cords|strong="H2256"\w*. And \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so.

So they drew \w up|strong="H4900"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* with \w cords|strong="H2256"\w*, and took him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w dungeon|strong="H0953"\w*: and \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w*.

¶ Then \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* unto him into the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w entry|strong="H3996"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, I will \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* thee a \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*; \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* nothing from me.\f + \fr 38.14 \ft third: or, principal\f*

Then \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w*, If I \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* unto thee, wilt thou not \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* put me to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*? and if I give thee \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*, wilt thou not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me?

So \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* \w secretly|strong="H5643"\w* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, that \w made|strong="H6213"\w* us this \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, I will not put thee to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, neither will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of these \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* unto \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; If thou wilt \w assuredly|strong="H3318"\w* go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon’s|strong="H0894"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, then thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall not be \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; and thou shalt \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:

But if thou wilt not go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon’s|strong="H0894"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, then shall this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, and they shall \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* it with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and thou shalt not escape \w out|strong="H4422"\w* of their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, I am \w afraid|strong="H1672"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* that are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, lest they \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* me into their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and they \w mock|strong="H5953"\w* me.

But \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, They shall not \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \add thee\add*. \w Obey|strong="H8085"\w*, I beseech thee, the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee: so it shall be \w well|strong="H3190"\w* unto thee, and thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

But if thou \w refuse|strong="H3986"\w* to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, this \add is\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* me:

And, behold, all the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* that are \w left|strong="H7604"\w* in the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah’s|strong="H3063"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add shall be\add* brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon’s|strong="H0894"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and those \add women\add* shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w friends|strong="H0582"\w* have set thee \w on|strong="H5496"\w*, and have \w prevailed|strong="H3201"\w* against thee: thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* are \w sunk|strong="H2883"\w* in the \w mire|strong="H1206"\w*, \add and\add* they are turned \w away|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w*.\f + \fr 38.22 \ft Thy friends: Heb. Men of thy peace\f*

So they shall bring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* all thy \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* and thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* to the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*: and thou shalt not escape \w out|strong="H4422"\w* of their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, but shalt be \w taken|strong="H8610"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*: and thou shalt cause this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* to be \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 38.23 \ft thou shalt cause…: Heb. thou shalt burn, etc\f*

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, Let no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* of these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, and thou shalt not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

But if the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* that I have \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with thee, and they \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, \w Declare|strong="H5046"\w* unto us now what thou hast \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* it not from us, and we will not put thee to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*; also what the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee:

Then thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, I \w presented|strong="H5307"\w* my \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, that he would not cause me to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jonathan’s|strong="H3083"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, to \w die|strong="H4191"\w* there.

Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, and \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* him: and he \w told|strong="H5046"\w* them according to all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*. So they left off \w speaking|strong="H2790"\w* with him; for the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* was not \w perceived|strong="H8085"\w*.\f + \fr 38.27 \ft they…: Heb. they were silent from him\f*

So \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w* until the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*: and he was \add there\add* when \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*.
